mapper.insert: insert into dbo.APP_INFO (APP_NAME, APP_VERSION, APP_DATE, APP_AUTHOR, APP_REMARK) values (#{appName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{appVersion,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{appDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appAuthor,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{appRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dbo.APP_INFO set APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, APP_VERSION = #{appVersion,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, APP_DATE = #{appDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APP_AUTHOR = #{appAuthor,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, APP_REMARK = #{appRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, APP_NAME, APP_VERSION, APP_DATE, APP_AUTHOR, APP_REMARK from dbo.APP_INFO
